alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Eastland and southern Stephens Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Daniel, or 9 miles south of Breckenridge, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Eastland, Ranger, Lake Cisco, Necessity, Caddo, Lake Daniel, Gunsight, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Eolian, Harpersville, Morton Valley, and Olden. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 345 and 354. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
